      • launch

        public final void launch(Player player,
          double speed,
          double distance,
          ParticleColor color)
        Launches the particle from players eye location in the direction they are looking
        Parameters:
        player - The player launching the projectile
        speed - Speed of the projectile (A double between 0.01 and 1.0)
        distance - Distance before partical disaapears (Assuming no effect)
        color - A ParticalColor

        public final void launch(Player player,
          Location start,
          Vector start_offset,
          Vector end_offset,
          double speed,
          double distance,
          ParticleColor color)
        Launches the particle from location with offsets affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        player - The player launching the projectile
        start - Location that the particle starts at
        start_offset - Affects end location of particle
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        speed - Speed of the projectile (A double between 0.01 and 1.0)
        distance - Distance before partical disapears (Assuming no effect)
        color - A ParticalColor

      • launch

          Vector start,
          Vector direction,
          Vector start_offset,
          Vector end_offset,
          double speed,
          double distance,
          ParticleColor color)
        Launches the particle from location in direction with offsets affecting trajectory
        Parameters:
        player - The player launching the projectile
        start - Location that the particle starts at
        direction - Direction of travel
        start_offset - Affects end location of particle
        end_offset - Affects end location of particle
        speed - Speed of the projectile (A double between 0.01 and 1.0)
        distance - Distance before partical disapears (Assuming no effect)
        color - A ParticalColor
